metadata.description: Structured learning paths for understanding HAQEI concepts
metadata.philosophy: Progressive learning that builds understanding systematically
metadata.author: I Ching Expert Agent

absolute_beginner.title: New to I Ching & HAQEI
absolute_beginner.description: Perfect starting point for those unfamiliar with Eastern philosophy or virtual persona concepts
learning_objectives: Understand what HAQEI does and why it's useful
Grasp the concept of virtual personas and bunenjin philosophy
Learn basic I Ching principles without being overwhelmed
Feel comfortable using the system

sequence.why_here: Start with the practical benefit users will experience
sequence.learning_focus: What virtual personas are and how they help you
key_points: AI personalities that represent different aspects of you
Based on your authentic traits, not generic templates
Useful for different situations and relationships

sequence.why_here: Philosophical foundation that makes multiple personas authentic
sequence.learning_focus: Why having multiple personas is natural and healthy
key_points: Context shapes which aspects we express
Japanese wisdom about natural human multiplicity

sequence.why_here: How HAQEI makes complex analysis user-friendly
sequence.learning_focus: How the system translates wisdom into practical insights
key_points: Bridges ancient wisdom with modern understanding

sequence.why_here: Core system that powers personality analysis
sequence.learning_focus: 64 hexagrams as personality pattern library
key_points: 64 different personality patterns from I Ching wisdom

sequence.why_here: How virtual personas maintain authenticity while adapting
sequence.learning_focus: Being genuine in different contexts

completion_criteria: Can explain what HAQEI does in their own words
Understands why multiple personas can be authentic
Feels ready to try the system
Has realistic expectations about what HAQEI provides

cultural_explorer.title: Understanding I Ching Wisdom
cultural_explorer.description: For those interested in the cultural and philosophical foundations
learning_objectives: Appreciate the depth of I Ching wisdom tradition
Understand key philosophical concepts
See how ancient wisdom applies to modern life
Develop cultural sensitivity and respect

sequence.why_here: Deep dive into the hexagram system
sequence.learning_focus: 64 hexagrams as systematic wisdom
key_points: Each hexagram represents fundamental life pattern
Comprehensive system covering all human experience

sequence.why_here: Building blocks of the hexagram system
sequence.learning_focus: How individual lines create complex meanings
sequence.cultural_context: Concept of change through line transformations
key_points: Moving lines indicate areas of change

sequence.why_here: The logical flow between hexagrams
sequence.learning_focus: Natural progression in life and personality development
sequence.cultural_context: Ancient understanding of natural order and development

sequence.why_here: How personality naturally evolves
sequence.learning_focus: Predictable patterns of growth and change

sequence.why_here: How HAQEI bridges cultures respectfully
sequence.learning_focus: Integrating Eastern wisdom with Western psychology

cultural_notes: Show how wisdom transcends cultural boundaries
completion_criteria: Appreciates the sophistication of I Ching system
Understands cultural significance respectfully
Can see connections between ancient wisdom and modern insights
Feels inspired to learn more about the tradition

practical_user.title: Using HAQEI Effectively
practical_user.description: Focus on practical application and getting the most from the system
practical_user.prerequisites: Basic understanding of virtual personas and HAQEI purpose
learning_objectives: Understand how to use HAQEI's features effectively
Learn to interpret results meaningfully
Know how to apply insights practically
Troubleshoot common issues

sequence.why_here: Understanding the system architecture helps effective use
sequence.learning_focus: How HAQEI's three layers work together
sequence.practical_benefit: Know what's happening behind the scenes
key_points: SafeMode protects your privacy and wellbeing

sequence.why_here: How your answers become personality insights
sequence.learning_focus: The process of personality analysis
key_points: Your responses map to personality patterns
Results reflect authentic traits, not random assignment

sequence.why_here: Why different personas are all authentically you
sequence.learning_focus: Natural variation in authentic expression
key_points: Context naturally brings out different aspects
All personas reflect your genuine traits

sequence.why_here: How to use insights for personal development
sequence.learning_focus: Following your natural growth patterns
key_points: Growth works best when following natural patterns
Forced change is less effective than natural evolution

practical_tips: Answer questions honestly for accurate results
Use different personas for different purposes
Review insights regularly as you grow
Trust the process even if some insights surprise you
completion_criteria: Knows how to use HAQEI features effectively
Understands how to interpret and apply results
Feels confident about the accuracy and usefulness
Can troubleshoot basic issues independently

technical_user.title: System Architecture & Implementation
technical_user.description: For developers, researchers, and technically minded users
technical_user.prerequisites: Technical background and interest in system design
learning_objectives: Understand HAQEI's technical architecture
Appreciate the algorithmic approach to wisdom integration
See how AI and traditional knowledge systems interact
Evaluate the system's technical soundness

sequence.why_here: Core computational layer deserves deep understanding
sequence.learning_focus: How I Ching calculations become personality analysis

sequence.why_here: User experience layer technical implementation
sequence.learning_focus: Cultural translation and accessibility systems
technical_details: Natural language processing for cultural concepts

sequence.why_here: Ethical AI and safety considerations
sequence.learning_focus: Protecting users and preserving wisdom integrity

sequence.why_here: The challenge of integrating knowledge systems
sequence.learning_focus: Bridging traditional wisdom and modern AI

completion_criteria: Understands the technical architecture thoroughly
Appreciates the complexity of wisdom-AI integration
Can evaluate the system's technical merits
Sees potential applications and improvements

advanced_practitioner.title: Mastering HAQEI Insights
advanced_practitioner.description: Deep dive for experienced users seeking maximum benefit
advanced_practitioner.prerequisites: Completed cultural_explorer or equivalent deep knowledge
learning_objectives: Master advanced interpretation techniques
Understand subtle aspects of personality analysis
Develop intuitive feel for the system
Guide others in effective usage

sequence.why_here: Deep understanding of developmental logic
sequence.learning_focus: Hexagram sequences and life progression patterns

sequence.why_here: Master change dynamics in personality
sequence.learning_focus: How personality naturally evolves and transforms

sequence.why_here: Granular analysis through line interpretations
sequence.learning_focus: Detailed personality insights through individual lines

sequence.why_here: Creating your own interpretive framework
sequence.learning_focus: Integrating HAQEI insights with other knowledge

mastery_indicators: Can provide nuanced interpretations of complex results
Integrates HAQEI insights with other wisdom traditions
Helps others understand and apply the system
completion_criteria: Demonstrates mastery of advanced concepts
Can teach others effectively
Integrates insights into broader personal development
Continues exploring and learning

progress_tracking.retention_testing: Periodic review to ensure lasting understanding

personalization.learning_style: Adapt to visual, auditory, or kinesthetic preferences
personalization.pace_adjustment: Speed up or slow down based on comprehension
personalization.interest_focus: Emphasize aspects most relevant to user interests
personalization.cultural_sensitivity: Adjust cultural explanations to user background

assistance_levels.minimal: Brief definitions and key points only
assistance_levels.standard: Full explanations with examples and context

comprehension.basic: Can explain concept in own words
comprehension.applied: Can see relevance to personal situation
comprehension.mastery: Can teach concept to others effectively

practical_application.recognition: Identifies when concepts apply to real situations
practical_application.adaptation: Modifies application to fit specific contexts
